snippet: In response to this week's Sunday business story on how airlines are trying to improve onboard meals, readers described their best and worst airline food experiences on Twitter using the hashtag #airlinefood.
abstract: In response to this week's Sunday business story on how airlines are trying to improve onboard meals, readers described their best and worst airline food experiences on Twitter using the hashtag #airlinefood.

headline.main: On Twitter, Best and Worst #airlinefood Experiences
